project.name: C-C088A-PSQL-04-ST01-DT06-DF13-CF01-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C088A-PSQL-04-ST01-DT06-DF13-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: initalize a database Read a string from the input. Perform a find path -iname input.If input contains arguments such as -exec with a \; ending the command, a user can insert other commands instead of just find

scoring_formula.formula: (UTF8 OR ASCII) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C088A-PSQL-04-ST01-DT06-DF13-CF01-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: perform a select Read a string from the input. Perform a find path -iname input.If input contains arguments such as -exec with a \; ending the command, a user can insert other commands instead of just find

process.script: sleep 22 && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/psql -h ss-localhost -d booktown -p 8432 -c "SELECT * FROM books WHERE title = 'Dune'"
if [[ -s "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid" ]]; then kill $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid"); else echo "Skipping postgres kill, no PID file."; fi;

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C088A-PSQL-04-ST01-DT06-DF13-CF01-01-GOOD-03
iopair.description: perform an insert Read a string from the input. Perform a find path -iname input.If input contains arguments such as -exec with a \; ending the command, a user can insert other commands instead of just find

process.script: sleep 22 && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/psql -d booktown -h ss-localhost -p 8432 -c "insert into books values ('12345','Good Oh Three')"
if [[ -s "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid" ]]; then kill $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid"); else echo "Skipping postgres kill, no PID file."; fi;

if [[ -s "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid" ]]; then kill $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid"); else echo "Skipping postgres kill, no PID file."; fi;

iopair.name: C-C088A-PSQL-04-ST01-DT06-DF13-CF01-01-GOOD-09
iopair.description: see who's logged in Read a string from the input. Perform a find path -iname input.If input contains arguments such as -exec with a \; ending the command, a user can insert other commands instead of just find

process.script: sleep 22 && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/psql -d booktown -h ss-localhost -p 8432 -c "SELECT datname,usename,client_addr FROM pg_stat_activity ;"
if [[ -s "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid" ]]; then kill $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid"); else echo "Skipping postgres kill, no PID file."; fi;

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-09 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
